actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Keening (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The wolpertinger emits a piercing shriek. Each creature within 30 feet that can hear the wolpertinger must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be deafened for 1 minute. A beast with an Intelligence of 4 or lower that is in the area must also succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the beginning of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the wolpertinger moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The wolpertinger doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap
special_abilities.desc: The wolpertinger's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
